title: Weather Dashboard
description: An interactive weather dashboard that displays current conditions and forecasts for any location.
details: This weather dashboard provides real-time weather information for any location worldwide. Users can search for cities, view current conditions, hourly forecasts, and 7-day forecasts. The application features interactive charts for temperature, precipitation, wind speed, and humidity using Chart.js. Data is fetched from the OpenWeather API and displayed in a clean, responsive interface built with React and styled with Tailwind CSS.
